review: Works great for what we intended it to do, quick streaming from phones or tablets  The TV keeps saying 480P even when some of the content was indeed 1080p but it was defintely better picture than 480p. Luckily we still have the 480p to compare !
author: Ash

review: My Bluray player takes too long to load Youtube and Netflix apps, so I'm using Chromecast for that. You don't get any ads when playing YouTube videos, a small nice bonus. Also after a couple of updates it finally started to play videos from ewas the reason  mbedded flash players in a mobile version of Chrome, so you can also watch Vimeo in HD quality. Software is still on a rough side, you'll have to reboot your tablet sometimes. Couldn't figure a simple way of streaming local media files, which I wanted it to do when considered this purchase.
author: Dmytro Aleksyeyenko
